Name: Overcooked Bone Meal
Description: A culinary byproduct primarily repurposed as garden fertilizer.
Description2$english: It is made by boiling wild animal horns, drying them, and grinding them into a nutrient-rich powder—ideal for nourishing flowers and plants. However, slight overprocessing has led to excessive nutrient loss.

recipes.Name: Overcooked Bone Meal
recipes.Des: It is made by boiling wild animal horns, drying them, and grinding them into a nutrient-rich powder—ideal for nourishing flowers and plants. However, slight overprocessing has led to excessive nutrient loss.

NeedMaterial.Name: Horn
NeedMaterial.Description: A field-harvested resource that can be reprocessed by life professions.
